Welcome to asw’s documentation!¶

contracts.Execute(Providers, Purchase_Items, Quotations, Scoring)¶

This executes the code Quality, Lcompany y Valid_key do not depend on purchase process (they are or not independently), but price and time score must be compared with the rest of quotations from the purchase process

contracts.Generate(Purchase_items, Quotations, Providers)¶

This is the function to show the menu for the user, offering several options to check the data and see the results

contracts.Lcompany(Providers, Quotations, Scoring)¶

This scores in terms of if the company is local or not, and scores according this item

contracts.Position(pp, Quotations)¶

Assign the position or Ranking (attribute from Quotation) of the Quotation

contracts.Price(pp, Quotations, Scoring)¶

This scores in terms of the price and sorts according this item

contracts.Quality_c(Providers, Quotations, Scoring)¶

This scores if has or not quality certification. Quality, lcompany and Vkey functions do not depend on purchase process (they are or not independently), but price and time score must be compared with the rest of quotations from the purchase process

contracts.Show(pp, Quotations)¶

Show every quotations of the respective purchase process, but it sorts them first and then shows them

contracts.Time(pp, Quotations, Scoring)¶

This scores in terms of the delivery time and sorts according this item

contracts.main()¶

These are the Sequential Steps to get information (tables) and start executing analysis I create 3 lists which contain providers, purchase processes and quotations, these lists have the same name as classes but in plural. They are initialized as empty lists, for storing information related to providers, purchase_items and quotations
